title: Drawing, "Fruit or Cereal Bowl", 1940–50
markings: Stamps: Designer's stamp printed in red ink, lower right: eva s. zeisel industrial design/431 RIVERSIDE DRIVE NEW YORK CITY; see inscription
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with measurements; in designer's stamp: FRUIT, CEREALBOWL 5 9/16"
description: Design for a fruit or cereal bowl.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Fruit or Cereal Bowl", 1940–50.
1940–50. Graphite on tracing paper. Gift of Eva Zeisel. 1993-11-42.
